channel.title: Unbanned?
channel.description:
Hello, and if a Moparscape staffs' person could please understand this for me.
My name is Umah, yes, from a very long time ago I was on Moparscape. However I got banned on August of the 7th I believe, for multiple accounts. Could someone possibly tell me how i'm able to browse Moparscape if i'm banned, because somehow i'm on. This is not a webproxy, it's my ip address. You can search all the other ip address's to check, i'm not using one.
Is this like an unbann or something, or what is this? I haven't been able to browser Mopar these past 2 months because it said I was banned from the forums, and now it's allowing me to?
P.S - I went to check every week on Mopar to see if any messages I sent to the admin, no response, I checked the website each week to see if I could browse it, and now I can..
Someone please explain this all to me? What's happening? And if we need to talk for any reason, please, please talk to me. Get me straight.

item.title: Unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Creating a new account and posting about it is one of the worst things you can do. You’re just digging yourself a deeper hole. Ask about it on the irc, not here.

Read full topic

item.title: Unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:7, topic:314298”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=410761.msg3030187#msg3030187 date=1258316708]
… If your banned you shouldn’t of posted, just pm Mitb, Niall, or lothy…
[/quote]

Send them this:

[quote]
Dear Administrator,

For some obscure reason, I recenty became unbanned from the forums. Please can you re-ban my account because I have been a naughty boy and deserve to be punished.

Thank You.
[/quote][/quote]LOL.

Read full topic

item.title: Unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Explisionist:

… If your banned you shouldn’t of posted, just pm Mitb, Niall, or lothy…

Send them this:

Dear Administrator,

For some obscure reason, I recenty became unbanned from the forums. Please can you re-ban my account because I have been a naughty boy and deserve to be punished.

Thank You.

item.title: Unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Lol, banned for having multiple accounts, yet you create another account to ask to be unbanned…

Irony?

Read full topic

item.title: Unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

=\ It just now allows me to view Mopar forums for the first time in 2 months of being banned, and already the first 10 seconds i get flamed… I’m just trying to get a few simple answers here…

Read full topic

@B2300_T4nk wrote:

If your banned then gtfo…
